original_text: When he was removed out of the highway, all the people went on after Joab, to pursue after Sheba the son of Bichri.
korean_text: 아마사를 큰길에서 옮겨가매 사람들이 다 요압을 따라 비그리의 아들 세바를 뒤쫓아가니라

sentences.original_text: When he was removed out of the highway
all the people went on after Joab
to pursue after Sheba the son of Bichri
